content: X-M6 D12 Threaded studs Carbon steel threaded stud for use with powder-actuated nailers on concrete or for sprayed concrete testing ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Threaded studs & standoffs- - - ### FEATURES:Features Engineered for easy-to-use, cordless DX fastening tools – up to 10 times quicker than drilling and with less vibration Thermo-pulled – engineered for more reliable fastening to concrete Applications Quick measurement of the early strength of sprayed concrete with 52, 72 and 95 mm studs Threaded connections (e.g. for miscellaneous attachments) on concrete ### TECHNICAL DATA: Base materials: Concrete (soft) Corrosion protection: Galvanized zinc coated 5-13 µm Environmental Conditions: Dry indoor Technical Data | Base materials | Concrete (soft) | Corrosion protection | Galvanized zinc coated 5-13 µm | Environmental Conditions | Dry indoor | Material | Metal | Point type | Ballistic | Product Class | Premium ### ITEMS- 306050 - Threaded stud X-M6-8-52 D12 - Package Size 100 pc - 306051 - Threaded stud X-M6-8-72 D12 - Package Size 100 pc
